title: 16-hour water cut for several areas in Gampaha
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); A 16-hour water cut will be in effect for several areas in Gampaha on Wednesday (15).

Accordingly, the supply of water will be suspended from 2 PM on Wednesday (15) to 6 AM on Thursday (16) for a period of 16-hours for the Gampaha Municipality, Miriswatte to Aluthgama – Bogamuwa Church Road on the Colombo to Kandy Road, and surrounding areas.
SriLankan Airlines recorded a LOSS of Rs. 45 Billion in 2021
